did.unittitle: International Molders Union, No. 107 (Auburn, NY) Minute Books on Microfilm, 1891-1926
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This is a collection of minute books dated: Feb. 1893-Oct. 1895, Oct. 1895-April 1902, May 1902-May 1905, July 1905-Sept. 1909, Oct. 1909-Jan. 1914, Jun. 1914-Aug. 1919, Sept. 1919- Dec. 1926.

bioghist.p: Iron Molders' Union of North America, was established in 1859 to represent craftsmen who cast wrought iron metal products. Local No. 107, represents members from the Auburn, New York area.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minute books dated: Feb. 1893-Oct. 1895, Oct. 1895-April 1902, May 1902-May 1905, July 1905-Sept. 1909, Oct. 1909-Jan. 1914, Jun. 1914-Aug. 1919, Sept. 1919-Dec. 1926.

controlaccess.corpname: International Molders' Union of North America. Local 107 (Auburn, N.Y.)
International Molders' Union of North America.
